data.text: @LedferdraRobert No snow here. But definitely waking up to 36° weather. Will be back in 70° next week here in IE 😉🤙

@LedferdraRobert As one great immunologist said We don’t have a flu and cold season We have a vitamin D deficiency season. There is an app called dminder it’s free download it and follow it you’ll get much better

@LedferdraRobert Don’t come back to California! I’m here and it’s no fun! And we have the worst Governor ever!! Find a nice warm red state. I’m hoping to leave here in a few years.  Wish you luck, and quick healing of your health.
